website_summaries.verdict: More than 40 pieces included to stock the ultimate Play-Doh collection in one purchase.
pros: This kit includes everything your child needs for an almost fully-stocked Play-Doh toy collection
The Fun Factory tool comes with 2 rails for different effects
It also includes 22 cutters, scissors, plastic knife, pizza cutter, a roller with attachments and 5 small tubs of Play-Doh
cons: Some users noted that the tool press can be difficult to fully clean between colors, but it did not affect how it worked

customer_reviews.title: Entertainment and a lesson in shapes!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler adores this set she is two and this has kept her entertained for many hours since I got it during Christmas. There are so many cut outs that it's hard to get bored. Plus it helps her learn words to because she like identifying the shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Play-Doh Fun Factory Mega Set
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter's 4th birthday. She loves it! She now makes pizzas and cupcakes and oh so many other things with her Play-Doh. She will spend an hour with her set and it has done wonders to help her motor skills too!
customer_reviews.author: Groovy 1

customer_reviews.title: Great Entertainment
customer_reviews.text: This was a great package, it came with lots of different options for kids to play with. The only thing I wasn't impressed with was the play mat. It was paper and was rolled up so it didn't sit very flat, with time i'm sure it will adjust. I figured the play mat would have been a better material. Other than that, my kids have a ton of fun playing with this and its great for learning as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: DOUGH you want to play? So fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun sensory toy for our toddler! The play dough "squisher" (the thing that makes noodles and what not) never gets old!
customer_reviews.author: Kalee M Horlacher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hours and hours of fun, even as an adults. Brings back memories and sparks the creativity.
customer_reviews.author: L. Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set. Everything that my 2 year old could ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful set. Everything that my 2 year old could want is included in this set. It's actually my new go to for birthday gifts. It's a decent sized box and looks like it's worth more than what I actually paid. And it's playdoh...what kid doesn't love playdoh?? ;)
customer_reviews.author: Keisha F

customer_reviews.title: Great set for budding Play-Doh fans.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good set with a variety of cutters/toys etc. This keeps my daughter entertained for hours and allows her to be creative which I love! It really has everything you need to get started with Play-Doh fun.
customer_reviews.author: V. Price

customer_reviews.title: LOVED this set!
customer_reviews.text: There's so much here. We bought it was a gift and the little boy played for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleena Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with taped seals broken, but product okay
customer_reviews.text: When this package arrived, the outer Amazon box was intact, but the Play-Doh box inside was slightly damaged with the taped seals already broken. I would've been highly disappointed if I had intended to give this item as a gift. Aside from that, the pieces seem to all be there and my 2 1/2 year old daughter is pleased with the Fun Factory.
customer_reviews.author: Carmille

customer_reviews.title: The roller that lets you make patterns comes with a rolling pin inside (you can disassemble it) which is really useful.
customer_reviews.text: This set has sooooo much. My daughter loves playing with it. The roller that lets you make patterns comes with a rolling pin inside (you can disassemble it) which is really useful.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleR

customer_reviews.title: They loved this set
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4 yr old twin grandkids. They loved this set, will play for hours making different shapes to keep up with their imagination.
customer_reviews.author: Sue K

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with play dough
customer_reviews.text: It’s play dough! Every kids loves it. I bought this set because it was basic enough for my 2 year old
customer_reviews.author: Torryn H.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! My daughter received it as a gift and plays with it for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get one for your grandkids!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson tried all the colors on his 1st play. I would say a major success to creativity!
customer_reviews.author: BeckkiC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my great granddaughter who is three. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: S. G.

customer_reviews.title: Great variety!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Lots of great tools/cutters for playing with play doh. My son really enjoys them. I've even used some of the cutters for making cookies. My only caveat - this was $15 when I purchased it and I definitely wouldn't spend the $69.99 it's listed at currently.
customer_reviews.author: wxyzzzzzzzz

customer_reviews.title: Fun Set.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome set! However the play mat was just a piece of paper. The rest of it though, is great! Now if only Play Doh made something to help clean the darn stuff up.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Has all the items in one
customer_reviews.text: Great! Has all the items I was looking for together plus play dough comes with them. My little guy loves it and we even use the accessories with kinetic sand. Fun
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Play-Doh everyday
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old wants to play with this every day. There are plenty of shapes to make all kinds of cool cutouts. The fun factory extruder is a little hard to press down for a 3 year old but that just gets mommy, daddy, and the grandparents more involved with playing. All the pieces are safe including the scissors and knife.
customer_reviews.author: Generic Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Play doh was nice and moist
customer_reviews.text: Play doh was nice and moist. This kit comes with a ton of tools and will keep your kids busy.
customer_reviews.author: Rollergirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing and will have lots of fun with it !
customer_reviews.author: Debracrites

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set to have and is a good 'starter' for preschoolers.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This was great buy will be for Christmas and will be lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Black Princess

customer_reviews.title: My daughter can play with this set for hours. ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter can play with this set for hours. Many parts, and keeps her busy for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: VKY

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my husband's niece's 7th birthday and she loved it. We visit regularly and she's always telling ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's niece's 7th birthday and she loved it. We visit regularly and she's always telling me about the new things she makes. She had asked me for a play-doh set that had lots of tools and shapes and this was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: A winner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my grandsons. We got 3 hours of straight play time out of it :) This is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Aviva

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun, but lever is hard to clean.
customer_reviews.text: The subject says it all. It's a ton of fun for me and my daughter, but the lever part needs to be cleaned after each color run through it. When you use it, Playdoh pushes into every crevice of it, making it very hard to clean. It doesn't really come part to clean easily, either.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter loved the set. Great quality, hours of play-doh fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: but this seemed like a good value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 4 year old niece for Christmas. She loves it! I admit to not being overly familiar with Play-Doh, but this seemed like a good value.
customer_reviews.author: ReadingRainbow

customer_reviews.title: but there are a lot of fun pieces.
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult to get excess Play-Doh out of the extruder, but there are a lot of fun pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Damaste

customer_reviews.title: Mega fun!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Play Doh? Mega set for mega fun. We spend hours with it!
customer_reviews.author: shelly Clapp

customer_reviews.title: Great Play-Doh Set, but packaging was damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Play-Doh packaging arrived damaged, which was not the best outcome as it's a gift. But great product and all pieces are present.
customer_reviews.author: Angela T.

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. It's just missing a big rolling pin so that kids can smooth out the playdoh to make shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Justin&Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun things to do. Get a box to hold all the parts!
customer_reviews.author: NNana

customer_reviews.title: Play-doh kit for kids
customer_reviews.text: How can kids not like play-doh? It is a great toy for kids to have fun for hours.
customer_reviews.author: ILUVTOTRAVEL

customer_reviews.title: Fun factory
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time. Bought the mega pack play doh with this. My 3 year old couldn't wait to play with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Large set nice box loads to do with this set.
customer_reviews.author: R Redmon

customer_reviews.title: Best Play Doh starter pack!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! It has all the basic tools in one set which makes it better than buying multiple ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Set is great, wish it didn't come with playdoh
customer_reviews.text: Great set, only wish I could get it without the playdoh for cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: This here is a very nice, large set of Play-Doh what nots. I was very impressed with it. Another perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: ankleblackrose

customer_reviews.title: fun factory
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old granddaughter. She absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: coffee lover

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy... fun for hours!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter received this for Christmas and absolutely loves it! It keeps her occupied for such a long time, with all of the cut outs and shapes that she can make. The only gripe I have is the play doh gets stuck in the little contraption that pushes out shapes. That is not a big deal though. It was definitely worth the $9.99!
customer_reviews.author: Awake_Chemically

customer_reviews.title: Tuns of Fun
customer_reviews.text: My son is 3 1/2. He loves this toy! The only thing he needs help with is putting the shape sticks into the press and getting them set right. Other than that it's great. He has sat for almost two hours playing with this and for parents of small children you know thats amazing. Clean up was pretty easy. The only thing is you have to make sure the press is free of any playdough or it will dry in there and clog it up. Over all it is one of his favorite toys.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. DeShong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Genius after you have your second child to keep the toddler busy while you feed. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this gift for my friend's daughter. My friend has to have a code word for this and hide it at times because her daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this set for my grand daughter (3). She absolutely loves it. Lots of shapes to make and enough play-doh to get started.
customer_reviews.author: lil mrs

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: My great-granddaughter was thrilled with this set. Just perfect for a 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: photobug

customer_reviews.title: A great Playdoh set!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 21 month old daughter. She is just starting to really get into the whole Playdoh thing. This is a perfect starter set since it has everything you need for basic play. Lots of options in the cutters and the roller is pretty cool too. A must for all Playdoh beginners.
customer_reviews.author: J. Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Fun Factor
customer_reviews.text: After a month of use, it has held up to abuse from my youngest for whom it was bought for. It dries out pretty fast and is rather hard to keep clean without some disassembly but it is all worth it for the pleasure of my child. To make the Play-Doh last, I recommend that you regularly sprinkle some water on the ones that are used.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Can play for hours
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter she is just over 2 1/2yrs old. The day this came she played for an hour and a half straight. I feel like it comes with a good variety of tools. I was also looking at the barrel play dough set and glad I chose this one. I just store all the stuff in a 5lb shake container we had around. My daughter goes for this everyday to play with
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what she wanted
customer_reviews.text: This came exactly as advertised with regular sized cans of playdoh. My daughter loves teh fun factory itself which has 2 long plates for making "spaghetti", "worms", tubes etc. The doh scissors are more like pinking shears, so if you are lookign for a straighter cut you will ahv eto use the plastic knife. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bowman

customer_reviews.title: ... for a Christmas present for my 2 yr old great nephew. This was the first Christmas he experienced ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a Christmas present for my 2 yr old great nephew. This was the first Christmas he experienced Play-Doh and we could barely tear him away! The pieces were good pieces for his age.
customer_reviews.author: Aury

customer_reviews.title: Play-Dohs not dead!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Grandaughter and she loved it!! Great for a Birthday present!
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this kit! There is everything your child needs and it is cheap!
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything you'd want except for a rolling pin.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful playdo set
customer_reviews.text: This is a large set. Great deal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: keeps the little one busy
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun and educational toy and a great way to spend some one-on-one time with my 2 year old. You can definitly get this cheaper in Walmart and Target.
customer_reviews.author: toddlermom

customer_reviews.title: fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: My 2 years son loves it, from the very beginning we play together ,now he is playing by himself almost 45 min and I can cook or do any work in my kitchen only tending him once in a while . We get it as a gift from his godmother 4 months ago, now I send her son the same gift. He learns a lot -colors, shapes, names of figurine, cutting, rolling. His favorite thing- making pizza, I am laughing all the time. Great for rainy days!!!
customer_reviews.author: alenkatim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The items we ordered were just what we wanted. . . thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

product_meta.title: Play-Doh Fun Factory Mega Set
product_meta.description:
Press out squiggly shapes with the fun factory or mold birds cars, fish and lots more. Includes: 22 cutters, scissors, plastic knife, pizza cutter. Roller (7 pieces), fun factory with 2 rails, play mat and 5 five-ounce cans of play-doh brand modeling compound.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Ramp up your fun sculpture production with this awesome FUN FACTORY Mega Set. More than 40 pieces and five cans of Play-Doh compound let you mold, shape and cut nearly any creation you can imagine.
feature_bullets: Awesome fun factory mega set - create your own amazing sculptures
Colorful multi-pack of Play-Doh modeling compound
Gigantic set of shapes, molds, tools and more lets you sculpt all kinds of fun creations
Set includes 22 cutters, scissors, plastic knife, pizza cutter, roller, fun factory extruder with 2 rails
Also included are play mat and 5 five-ounce cans of Play-Doh Brand Modeling compound

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars138 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
